price: Kuma haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Mũsã littãfi, sai aka sãɓã* wa jũna a cikinsa. Kuma bã dõmin wata kalma wadda ta gabãta daga Ubangijinka ba, haƙĩƙa, dã an yi hukunci a tsakãninsu. Kuma haƙĩƙa, sunã a cikin wata shakka, game da shi, mai sanya kõkanto.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَٱخۡتُلِفَ فِيهِۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهُ مُرِيبٖ
footnotes: * Yahũdãwa sun sãɓa wa jũna a cikin littattafan da aka bai wa Mũsã. To, ku Musulmi kada ku bi hanyarsu, har ku sãɓawa Allah, har abin da ya sãme su ya sãme ku.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba fa-ukh'tulifa fīhi walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum wa-innahum lafī shakkin min'hu murībin
